author: Amazon Customer

review: We purchased the Amazon Fire Stick after our Chromecast suddenly quit working after one year (error: Brain Freeze). The picture quality with the Fire TV Stick is impeccable and has upgraded and improved the picture on our 8 year old LCD flat screen, which is way outdated as technology and pixel quality has come a long way in the last decade. I love that it comes with a remote control, yet also allows us the option of using our phones and tablets (with a free Fire Stick app) to control the channels, etc. Fire stick allows us to watch all of our favorite channels (HBOgo, Showtime Anytime, Netflix, Youtube, Amazon Streaming, Hulu, and Vimeo...plus many more. It is extremely affordable and super easy to install. I highly recommend the Amazon Fire Stick.
author: Brooklyn Hudson
